questions_and_answers.question: What is the main functionality of the image_control plugin for ComfyUI?
questions_and_answers.answer: The image_control plugin allows users to manipulate images using various features such as inpainting with LaMa, outpainting, resizing images, altering body proportions, etc.

questions_and_answers.question: Can I resize images with the image_control plugin?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, the image_control plugin provides a functionality to 'Resize Image' (zoom in/out) to modify the size of images.

questions_and_answers.question: Does the image_control plugin address some common issues with body proportions in generated images?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, the image_control plugin includes a feature named 'Change Breast' that specifically solves the problem of the pelvis becoming enlarged when printing huge breasts.

questions_and_answers.question: Can I apply the lowrise pants effect with the image_control plugin?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, the image_control plugin allows users to apply the 'Lowrise (lowlegs) pants' effect.

questions_and_answers.question: Is there a feature to create see-through clothes using the image_control plugin?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, the image_control plugin includes a feature named 'see-through clothes' to create see-through clothing effects.

questions_and_answers.question: Can I modify the size of the head in images using the image_control plugin?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, the image_control plugin has a feature named 'Resize Head' that allows users to modify the size of the head in images.

questions_and_answers.question: Is there an option to show only one breast with the image_control plugin?
questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, there is a feature named 'Showing only 1 breast' in the image_control plugin to show only one breast in images.

questions_and_answers.question: Where can I find the workflow for the image_control plugin?
questions_and_answers.answer: The workflow for the image_control plugin is available at the following GitHub link: https://github.com/abyz22/image_control/blob/master/imgs/sample.json and a related image is provided at: https://github.com/abyz22/image_control/blob/master/imgs/sample.png
